ygData.subject: Re: Race Wars Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, I never even thought about what all this is doing to the test server.  Hopefully, as you said, things will settle down.  I foresee a great number
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, I never even thought about what all this is doing to the test server.
<blushes> Hopefully, as you said, things will settle down. I foresee a great
number of the people I currently have on ignore suddenly leaving
Povar........heh.

Now, I've mentioned before that I have a character on the PvP server, Rallos
Zek. I made her after a couple of my guild brothers scoped it out and decided
it was alot cooler than previously thought. People who kill newbies are
ostracized and ridiculed. I had others of my race calling me "little sister"
and giving me things that they had outgrown. People who kill others of their
race (at least, the dark elves work this way) are also ostracized. And I must
admit, with shame, that I had a great time hunting down humans in the forest
around Neriak. I never actually killed one by myself, so I never looted, and I
probably wouldn't anyway. The point is, it was a darker side of RP that I found
interesting to explore. Will it change when the race server opens up?
Probably. Will I check out the race war server? Probably. Will that be my new
"home"? Decidedly not. I've lived with pk's in MUDS, RPG's (UO for sure, plus a
couple other more obscure games), and even RTS's. I like not having to deal
with them daily on EQ.

Sara, Povar

Mitzi wrote:

> From: "Mitzi" <mitzi@...>
>
> Had to speak up on this one.. I call test my home.. I've always played there
> and love helping out, making a new character to test whatever it is they are
> requesting at the time.. giving feedback on new things.. that's what we're
> there for.. but I totally disagree with what they have done to our server..
>
>
> Mitzi
